abstract: Game 2 of the A.L.C.S. is postponed because of rain.
snippet: Game 2 of the A.L.C.S. is postponed because of rain.
lead_paragraph: After two rain delays interrupted Game 1 of the American League Championship Series on Saturday night, Major League Baseball did not take any chances on Sunday. With more rain expected Sunday night, Game 2 of the series between the Texas Rangers and the Detroit Tigers was postponed Sunday afternoon, about seven hours before the scheduled first pitch. It was rescheduled for Monday afternoon at 4:19 Eastern. Tigers Manager Jim Leyland also announced that right fielder Magglio Ordonez injured his right ankle in Game 1 and is out for the rest of the postseason. More details are available here.
